review: Tattapani is a beautiful location on the bank of Lake Satluj. It's just 45 km from Shimla. Its famous for its mineral-rich hot springs. You can take bath. They usually charge between Rs 200-250/- per person. These sulphur springs are believed to have medicinal value. The sulphurous water relief from like joint pain, fatigue, stress relief, and poor blood circulation, and reduces fat and skin diseases.
name: Shikha G
